steps.name: Open https://staging.freelancer.nl/
Disable cookies
Log in as recipient user
Click "LOG IN"
Enter email: AQA-CI-PRLqz-750-U-Recip-PIVzh@mailsac.com
Enter password: AQA-CI-PRLqz-750-U-Recip-PIVzh
Click "LOG IN"
Verify that the user is logged
Verify that the email message is correct
Verify that the recipient's first name in the email is AQA-CI-PRLqz-750-U-Recip-PIVzh
Verify that the recipient's last name in the email is 40498
Verify that the custom msg in the email is spCSxEVZus
Verify that the organization name is AQA-CI-PRLqz-750-U-Send-PIVzh
Follow the link from the mail: https://staging.freelancer.nl/account/organization/invite?token=6b12fb80513ec361d6703e8f912fea5ae927e36dua0
Check invitation message
Verify that the message contain AQA-CI-PRLqz-750-U-Send-PIVzh 06579
Verify that the organization name is AQA-CI-PRLqz-750-U-Send-PIVzh
Click "Accept"
Open https://staging.freelancer.nl/account/settings/organization
Verify that the full name of the 0 user is AQA-CI-PRLqz-750-U-Send-PIVzh 06579
Verify that the role of the 0 user is Account holder
Verify that the full name of the 1 user is AQA-CI-PRLqz-750-U-Recip-PIVzh 40498
Verify that the role of the 1 user is Agent
Verify that the pending invitation has disappeared
